member.name: E:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloader.DownloadReport
member.summary: Event that fires every time an image is downloaded. Contains information about the current downloads.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloader.DownloadComic(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads a comic from a url to the specified path, a folder with the comic name will be automatically generated if it doesn't exists already. This method is not thread-safe, so just call it one at a time.
member.param: The uri where the images are located.
The path were the comic folder will be created.
member.returns: An array of errors. If there were no errors it's an empty array.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloader.DownloadComics(System.Uri[],System.String)
member.summary: Downloads a bunch of comics from the urls, this method is provided for allowing the download of multiple comics at a time.
member.param: The uris where the comic images are located.
The path where to download the comics.
member.returns: An array of errors. If there were no errors it's an empty array.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloader.Dispose
member.summary: Frees all managed resources from this instance of . It also unsubscribes from all events.

member.name: T:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader
member.summary: Base implementation of . Contains helper methods that help subclasses implement the methos of .

member.name: E:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader.ImageFinishedDownloading
member.summary: An event that fires every time an image has finished downloading. You shouldn't invoke this event directly, instead use .

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader.Download_Comic(System.Uri,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim,System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection{System.String})
member.summary: Override this method to implement the action of downloading the comic. The collection is passed, and is intended to be used only to pass a reference to the method . Any exception that is thrown in this method will be correctly handed by , so you don't need to try/catch this method.
member.param: The uri where the comic is located.
The path where the comic will be downloaded.
The client to use.
This allows to have a control on how many images are downloaded at a time.
The errors collection
member.returns: A task that completes once the comic has been downloaded or an error ocurred downloading the comic. It doesn't stops for image errors.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader.Get_Number_Of_Images(System.Uri)
member.summary: Override this method to implement the action of getting the number of images. You don't need to try/catch this method, already handles any exception this method could throw.
member.param: The url where the comic resides.
member.returns: The number of images the comic has.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader.ConstructComicPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a sanitizes a comic path.
member.param: The path where the comic should be downloaded.
The title of the comic.

member.name: M:Comic_Downloader.CMD.ComicsDownloaders.BaseComicDownloader.DownloadFileAsync(System.String,System.Uri,System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim,System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Downloads an image asyncronously on the specified . This path should be already sanitized, you can use the method . You can also optionally rename the file that will be downloaded.
member.param: The path where the image will be downloaded. It must be sanitized.
The uri where the image is online.
The semaphore used to control how many downloads are active.
The HTTP Client to use.
The collection that stores the errors.
The name the file will have when it's downloaded. If this is null, the default name from the uri will be used.
member.returns: A task that completes once the file is downloaded.
